attributes.action: MPs pay should be Performance Related
attributes.background:
Many employees in this country are subject to Performance Related Pay. MPs promise a lot but so often fail to deliver. This sort of performance should be reflected in their wallets by linking all or part of their salary to performance.
An independent body could set objectives annually.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government. 

You can find out how to contact IPSA here: 

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
